request for cosmetic change.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 4. Request for cosmetic change with excellent appearance of nose.

left ear cartilage graft.context: Operative Procedures: 1. Left ear cartilage graft.

repair of nasal vestibular stenosis.context: Operative Procedures: 2. Repair of nasal vestibular stenosis using an ear cartilage graft.

severe nasal septal deviation.context: Severe nasal septal deviation to the right hand side and evidence of an old fracture with a separate alignment of the cartilaginous nose from the bony nose was encountered.

old fracture.context: Severe nasal septal deviation to the right hand side and evidence of an old fracture with a separate alignment of the cartilaginous nose from the bony nose was encountered.

inverted going incision.context: Procedure began with an inverted going incision and elevation of the skin of the nose in the submucoperichondrial plane over the medial crural footplates and lower lateral cartilages and up over the dorsum.

elevation of the skin.context: Procedure began with an inverted going incision and elevation of the skin of the nose in the submucoperichondrial plane over the medial crural footplates and lower lateral cartilages and up over the dorsum.

medial and lateral osteotomies.context: The upper laterals were divided and medial and lateral osteotomies were carried out.

left postauricular incision.context: Inadequate septal cartilage was noted to be present for use as spreader graft; therefore, left postauricular incision was made, and the conchal bowl cartilage graft was harvested, and it was closed with 3-0 running locking chromic with a sterile cotton ball pressure dressing applied.

conchal bowl cartilage graft.context: Inadequate septal cartilage was noted to be present for use as spreader graft; therefore, left postauricular incision was made, and the conchal bowl cartilage graft was harvested, and it was closed with 3-0 running locking chromic with a sterile cotton ball pressure dressing applied.

Doyle splints.context: Doyle splints were placed on each side of nasal septum and secured with 3-0 nylon and a Denver splint was applied.

Denver splint.context: Doyle splints were placed on each side of nasal septum and secured with 3-0 nylon and a Denver splint was applied.
